cont.entity_a: Affordable at under $20, compared to more expensive alternatives.
Not suitable for small hands; causes strain in the index finger due to size. Large size may not be suitable for small hands.

Helps alleviate wrist pain, especially for medium to large hands. Comfortable for prolonged use, reducing wrist strain. Ergonomically beneficial, reducing wrist and finger pain. Shape encourages a natural wrist position. Comfortable grip and wrist position. Comfortable and ergonomic, reducing wrist pain. Very comfortable for large hands, reducing hand and wrist pain.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable and lightweight with configurable buttons.

cont.entity_a: Easy software installation, taking about 2 minutes.
Loud clicking sound when buttons are pressed.

No on/off button or rechargeable batteries, but good battery life for moderate use. High battery life, lasting several months. Good battery life with long-lasting performance. Short wireless range and consumes batteries quickly.
cont.entity_b: Swappable batteries allow continuous use without docking. Battery life is short, requiring frequent swaps. Comes with two batteries and a small charger stand. Fast battery swap feature is convenient. Short battery life can be a drawback for heavy use. Frequent battery changes needed due to short life span.

cont.entity_a: Good accuracy for tasks like Photoshop. Trackball has great sensitivity.
cont.entity_b: Excellent tracking and sensitivity. Great for gaming with adjustable sensitivity. Suitable for gamers with fast response time and adjustable sensitivity.

cont.entity_a: Some units may be defective, but replacements are available. Some units may experience left-click failure after two years. Overall, a solid and durable mouse.
cont.entity_b: Some users experience left button wear over time.

cont.entity_a: Heavy with two batteries, but can be used with one to reduce weight.
Short wireless range, becomes erratic if more than 5 inches from the receiver. Short wireless range and large receiver.
cont.entity_b: Good wireless range and ergonomic design.

cont.entity_a: Good customer service experience with replacements for defective units.
cont.entity_b: Logitech customer service is responsive to issues.

cont.entity_a: Ergonomic design takes time to get used to but is effective. Gel thumb-grip may discolor over time.
cont.entity_b: Stylish design with good grip and long battery life in gaming mode.

cont.entity_a: Top center buttons for magnification and page back functions. Scroll wheel is difficult to press.

cont.entity_b: Issues with WiFi interference affecting performance. Great mouse but has a tendency to freeze due to interference. Interference from other wireless devices can cause issues. Not recommended if you have other wireless devices due to interference.
